After finishing portal 2 a couple years ago, I found myself coming back to it multiple times again.
the amazing script writing and voice acting still made me laugh.
the puzzles that I forgot about still felt creative and interesting, even if I had already completed them.
there is no reason for you to not have this game in your steam library.
so in short, fuck you, GlaDOS.
One of the best Games, but PLEASE play Portal 1 first to better understand the Story

This has to be one of my favorite coop games of all time.  I've been a gamer since I was little, but most of my friends have never picked up a controller in their lives.  This game is one that we all can enjoy, and I really like that the co-op mode is different from the main game.  It just adds a new level of replayability to the game.  Plus, I love the dialogue.  Even though the main character never speaks, there is still so many funny and fun moments in the game.  
I definitely recommend this game to anyone who is looking for something new and interesting to play.

(Also, for people wondering why my time in it is so low if I like it so much, I also own it for Xbox and beat the main game on there.  Yes, it was well worth getting it on Steam too.)

It's hard to explain... The environments are charming in some way, and the portal gun is one of the coolest mechanics I've ever seen in a game. However, solving a series of roughly 10 puzzles got repetitive.
wow!
Absolutely great game, I love it.

Best Game ever, 10 hrs of laughing and getting stuck on levels but when you get them it is most statisfing feeling ever. Play it with a friend and get annoyed together for more fun.
Solid 10/10 not ign.
Love this game played it twice on console and PC.

Honestly one of the best games I have ever played. If you hadn't played the first one I would highly recommend playing it first. The single player and co-op are flawless and Portal Stories: Mel ads an entire other story line and new challenges. If it's on sale get it. If it's not on sale, get it or wait because it's always going on sale. If you've never played a portal game and have no idea what you're getting into, good luck.

One of my favorite games. It's ageless, with great twists in the environments. Graphics are well balanced so it looks great even today. The puzzels are really good, and just as challenging as they should. I really enjoyed every minute of the game so I really recommend it!

Pre-ordered this game back in 2010. Played both Portal 1 and 2. I spent over 400 hours on them. I can still play them at any time and I enjoy playing them. This game is genious and just proves that VALVe knows how to make games. Okay okay... Are you still thinking whether you should or should not buy this game? Okay, I'll help you.

Do you like puzzle games?
Yes: Buy Portal 2.
No: Buy Portal 2.

Oh.. you came becouse of an actual, useful review? Okay then...
PLUSes
+ Very good, somewhat gripping and super enjoyable story. Insane and unpredictable Plot Twists.
+ Cooperation mode!
+ Good graphics. Yet you can still somehow run this game on a toaster. Source Engine in a nutshell i guess.
+ Gameplay is outstanding.
+ Puzzles are not easy, yet not hard.

MINUSes
- Loadings. There are way too many of them...
- Can't think of anything more really...

Verdict: Buy it, there is no possible way you won't enjoy it. 9.99/10 bcoz nobody gives 10/10.
Easily one of the best puzzle games ever created. Highly recommended for everyone.

The years go by, yet this game still stands as my favorite game ever. And I've played a lot of games.

A very strong atmosphere, great voices, neat graphics, amazing gameplay, strong and very rewarding puzzles, and the best part for last, the multiplayer is just incredibly fun. You can even create your own maps and challenge your friends.

Highly recommand it!

Imperdibile!
Un piccolo capolavoro dedicato soprattutto a chi adora i puzzle non banali, ma comunque risovibili con un po' di ingegno e fantasia :)
Il tutto accompagnato da una storia piacevole da seguire e ricca di humor :)
10/10 GLaDOS is the best tsundere.

Игра в которой концентрация харизматичных и злых персонажей просто зашкаливает. При этом, практически к каждому из них проникаешься симпатией. Это очень круто, когда к головоломке удается создать очень крутой сюжет и атмосферу, котороые не то что бы дополняют игру, а скорее сама игра дополняет сюжет.

Clever jump&run&puzzle game. Loved the Story around the other compatitive company in the Half Life universe. There are hints about Black Mesa and how both companys developed.

Bu oyuna puanım 10/10 hayatımda oynadığım en iyi hikayeli oyunlardan birisi tabikide en iyisi Quantum Break ;)
Ama bu oyunda efsane oyunda dilsiz bir deney faresisiniz ve o laboratuvardan kaçmaya çalışıyorsunuz ve sizi kurtarmaya çalışan robotun eline laboratuvarın kontrolü geçiyor ve gözü dönüyor eski kontrolcüyüde çipine ayırıp sizi bir boşluğa bırakıyor o çipi patatese bağlayıp kontrolü eski kontrolcünün eline geçirmeye çalışıyorsunuz.Neyse daha fazla anlatmayayım devamını siz oynayın :) Ve oyun o kadar fazla sistem gereksinimi istemiyor tost makinesi ile oynasanız bile çok kasmaz merak etmeyin :D

I loved this game from start to finish. Glados and Wheatley were great characters. Specially Glados, of course, who was as funny and menacing as I remembered from Portal 1. Solving every puzzle and figuring out how to complete a challenge and level was incredibly rewarding and the turns the story took kept me always interested and always wanting to know more. The multiplayer aspect of the game was also a lot of fun.

Nominating in the "Villain most in need of a hug" category for obvious reasons.
Unrivaled masterpiece in writing, presentation, and puzzles. And will run on basically any computer from the past decade
